verses.roman:
nityānande kahe prabhu,--śunaha, śrīpāda
ei āmi māgi, tumi karaha prasāda

synonyms: nityānande—unto Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu; kahe—says; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śunaha—please hear; śrī-pāda—O holy man; ei—this; āmi—I; māgi—request; tumi—You; karaha—kindly show; prasāda—mercy.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then told Nityānanda Prabhu, "Please hear Me, O holy man: I now request something of You. Kindly grant My request.
